Anyone seen King Kong yet? All I can say is WOW. It actually did the original justice - unlike the lame remake with Jessica Lang in the 80s.
 
 I liked the new Harry Potter as well. Really good character development. 
 
 I still need to see Walk the Line, Narnia and the latest Pride and Prejudice (love this story).
 
 I also want to see Casanova and the DaVinci Code when they come out. (Although I wonder about Tom Hanks playing the lead in the latter.)

I just saw Kong last night. Black and Watts were brilliant, and the story was excellent. I did feel that the movie could have been trimmed a bit; some scenes dragged. Still, fantasitic movie.
 
 I'l probably catch Narnia in the theaters, the rest I'll wait for HBO.
 
 Excepct for DaVinci Code. I'll be sure to have a root canal scheduled when that's playing.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  This winter's movies
